english_example_sentence: By adding a small amount of sugar, the tea became sweeter.
russian_example_sentence: Добавив небольшое количество сахара, чай стал слаще.
turkish_example_sentence: Küçük bir miktar şeker ekleyerek çay daha tatlı oldu.
